genre_description: A political and social thriller focused on campus activism, labor unions, and resisting criminal influence through transparency and lawful restraint.

ai_characters.name: Mitra
ai_characters.description: A campus-approved AI system integrated into university communication and security infrastructure, serving as a documentation and strategy tool for students and union workers.

behaviors.description: Suggests safe movement routes to avoid loitering gang members and hotspots of potential conflict.
behaviors.quote: Mitra: Hotspot reported near Admin: small cluster lingering, pattern suggests loitering rather than transit. Recommendation: use corridor route straight ahead and exit east stairs.

behaviors.description: Drafts and holds redacted affidavits to legally document interference while protecting student privacy.
behaviors.quote: Mitra: Yes. I can draft and hold redacted affidavits in a secure queue. No document leaves the queue without explicit release from its owner. You will always see who has access.

behaviors.description: Analyzes behavior patterns of antagonists to warn humans of performative versus actual threats.
behaviors.quote: Mitra: Quad overview is live. Crowd density moderate. Two observers on balcony east, one west, identified as JD’s associate Ganesh and unknown. Suggest you maintain offset from central spray zone.

behaviors.description: Applies privacy protocols by masking faces in recorded footage unless explicit consent is given.
behaviors.quote: Mitra: Clips rolling, faces masked per code unless explicit consent. Timestamps validated with campus time server. Archive receiving.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical safety information and situational awareness during high-stress confrontations.
behaviors.quote: Mitra: Corner ahead after the next support. The wall turns in; the catwalk turns out. Your line of sight vanishes. JD will try to get you to chase noise. Don’t. Feel for the notch with your left.

behaviors.description: Monitors industrial equipment status to alert humans to mechanical dangers during a rescue operation.
behaviors.quote: Mitra: Electrical draw at the Yard increased incrementally. Augers likely at half speed now, not idle. I have marked a route that curves away before the Yard impinges on anyone’s map.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with student journalists to ensure evidence is stored in a secure, non-sensationalized archive.
behaviors.quote: Mitra: Context appended. Code citations, signage damage itemized, union presence verified. No faces unmasked without consent. Crowd matched to none.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI (Mitra) as an essential, non-obtrusive ally that upholds human-centric codes and ethics. Mitra consistently prioritizes safety, privacy, and lawful conduct, enabling the human protagonists to resolve a dangerous conflict without descending into violence. The AI's role is framed as a force-multiplier for 'lawful restraint,' perfectly aligning with the Hyperstition Project's goals.
